event.description: Sherman Johnson strikes out swinging.
Devon Travis called out on strikes.
James Ramsey grounds out to first baseman John Mayberry.
Jayce Boyd flies out to right fielder Hunter Pence.
John Nogowski flies out to center fielder Shane Victorino.
Justin Gonzalez strikes out swinging.
Pitcher Change: Jake Diekman replaces Austin Hyatt.
Jose Brizuela called out on strikes.
Stephen McGee walks.
Seth Miller grounds out, shortstop Jimmy Rollins to first baseman John Mayberry. Stephen McGee to 2nd.
Sherman Johnson called out on strikes.
Defensive Substitution: Freddy Galvis replaces shortstop Jimmy Rollins, batting 1st, playing shortstop.
Defensive Substitution: Tyson Gillies replaces center fielder Shane Victorino, batting 3rd, playing center field.
Pitcher Change: Jeremy Horst replaces Jake Diekman.
Devon Travis grounds out, shortstop Freddy Galvis to first baseman John Mayberry.
James Ramsey flies out to left fielder Domonic Brown.
Jayce Boyd lines out to right fielder Hunter Pence.

John Nogowski singles on a ground ball to left fielder Scott Podsednik. Jayce Boyd to 2nd.

Jose Brizuela grounds into a force out, second baseman Pete Orr to shortstop Freddy Galvis. Jayce Boyd to 3rd. John Nogowski out at 2nd. Jose Brizuela to 1st.
With Stephen McGee batting, wild pitch by J. C. Ramirez, Jayce Boyd scores. Jose Brizuela to 2nd.
With Stephen McGee batting, Jose Brizuela steals (1) 3rd base.
